rows.label: tev045801_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev045801_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Heptana about the Prone way of life.

rows.label: tev045801_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev045801_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Heptana about recent developments.

rows.label: tev045801_SEL1011
rows.name: Ask Heptana about indigens in Cauldros.

rows.label: tev045801_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Heptana about recent developments.

rows.label: tev045801_SEL2011
rows.name: Ask Heptana about indigens in Cauldros.

rows.label: tev045801_SEL2021
rows.name: Ask Heptana about recent developments.

rows.label: tev045801_SEL3011
rows.name: Ask Heptana about indigens in Cauldros.

rows.label: tev045801_SEL3021
rows.name: Ask Heptana about recent developments.

rows.label: tev045801_MSG0001
rows.name: You Earth aliens make food in your plant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045801_MSG0002
rows.name:
But Prone do not. We only hunt beasts in nature.
Hunt by our own two hands.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045801_MSG0003
rows.name:
Males learn to hunt when they come of age.
Females learn how to control beasts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045801_MSG0004
rows.name:
But there are exceptions. Like me.
I grew up hunting with my brothers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045801_MSG0005
rows.name: But so long as I live off land, I remain true Prone![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045801_MSG0010
rows.name:
Most Prone males are brave warriors.
But some are not.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045801_MSG0011
rows.name:
Take Nemard. He was held by Ganglion in same cell
as me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045801_MSG0012
rows.name:
Nemard is hopeless. Cannot hunt to save his life.
He is barely Prone at all![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045801_MSG0013
rows.name:
It's lucky I am around to hold hand.
I don't know what he would do otherwise.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045801_MSG0014
rows.name:
I doubt he has slain single beast since coming here.
He is probably starving.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045801_MSG0015
rows.name:
So I will do favor and hunt imp lophid so he can eat.
Just this once.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045801_MSG1001
rows.name:
I have been seeking advice about Cauldros.
Me and Nemard will go there soon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045801_MSG1002
rows.name: It seems Cauldros is fascinating.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045801_MSG1003
rows.name:
For example, it has giant fish called balaena.
If you destroy whiskers, you can sometimes obtain
lucky rainbow whisker.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045801_MSG1004
rows.name:
Legend says couple who wears lucky rainbow whisker
will live out lives together.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045801_MSG1005
rows.name:
So I will hunt balaenas and grab future for Nemard
and me two whiskers at time! Haw haw haw![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045801_MSG1010
rows.name: Nemard's hunting improves by leaps and bounds.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045801_MSG1011
rows.name: We now have more delicious meat than we can eat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045801_MSG1012
rows.name: Maybe we should make little mouths to feed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045801_MSG1013
rows.name:
Yes! Me and Nemard must build huge family!
One to make all Prone proud![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045801_MSG2001
rows.name: I have one less distraction. Now I can focus on hunt.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045801_MSG2002
rows.name:
It seems Cauldros has interesting beasts.
Might be worth exploring.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045801_MSG2003
rows.name:
For example, it has giant fish called balaena.
If you destroy whiskers, you can sometimes obtain
lucky rainbow whisker.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045801_MSG2004
rows.name: This material can be sold for high price![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045801_MSG2005
rows.name:
You should go to Cauldros. Hunt what you can.
Make small fortune. Or large one![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045801_MSG2010
rows.name:
Helpless girl like Enneana is good fit for helpless
boy like Nemard. Keeping her safe will force him to be
true Prone man.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045801_MSG2011
rows.name:
I wanted to be with him. But what can I say?
They are better fit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045801_MSG2012
rows.name: Let them live happy, stupid lives. It is better this way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045801_MSG2013
rows.name: Now I live for hunt. No mate will burden me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045801_MSG3001
rows.name:
I hear that continent has monsters you would not
believe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045801_MSG3002
rows.name:
Great giants called Gularth lurk in lava pools.
They are big enough to crush you beneath foot![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045801_MSG3003
rows.name:
And beast called tersqual breathes searing fire.
All nearby are charred like overcooked meat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045801_MSG3004
rows.name: I cannot visit such place now that I have family...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045801_MSG3005
rows.name:
You also should also not venture into such peril without
preparation. Many would miss you if you died.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045801_MSG3010
rows.name:
Me and Nemard will make family big enough to
impress Grandfather Auld! Ha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045801_MSG3011
rows.name: But big family needs much meat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045801_MSG3012
rows.name:
So there is no time to mourn.
We must continue hunt. Slaughter beasts.
It is only way to ensure future![ST:wait ]
